plugins.name: unity-agentic-tools
plugins.description: Parse, inspect, and edit Unity YAML files (.unity, .prefab, .asset) with a native Rust parser. Returns structured hierarchies and component data instead of raw YAML, reducing token usage by 10-50x compared to reading files directly.

plugins.name: unity-build-settings
plugins.description: Read and analyze Unity ProjectSettings/ files including EditorBuildSettings, PlayerSettings, and build profiles. Use when checking build targets, version info, or project configuration. Do NOT use for scene/prefab content â€” use unity-agentic-tools instead.
